scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'src/views/CategoryPage.vue'; const commit = require('child_process').execSync('git rev-parse HEAD').toString().trim(); const contents = fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8'); const updated = contents.replace(/buildCode: '.*?'/, `buildCode: '${commit}'`); fs.writeFileSync(path, updated);" && vite build
